content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Iron Plate Processing Facility at Position (0.0, 0.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Stone Furnace at position (0.0, 0.0) processing iron ore into iron plates.
- Wooden Chest at position (1.5, 0.5) storing iron plates.
- Burner Inserter at position (2.5, 0.5) intended to transfer items but currently waiting for source items.

### Copper Plate Processing Facility at Position (-21.0, -62.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Stone Furnace at position (-21.0, -62.0) processing copper ore into copper plates.
- Wooden Chest at position (-20.5, -63.5) storing iron plates.

### Coal Mining and Storage Facility at Position (52.5, -84.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner Mining Drill at position (53.0, -83.0) extracting coal.
- Wooden Chest at position (52.5, -84.5) storing coal but is currently full.
- Wooden Chest at position (54.5, -84.5) storing additional coal.

### Copper Ore Mining Facility at Position (-23.0, -68.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner Mining Drill at position (-23.0, -68.0) extracting copper ore.
- Wooden Chest at position (-23.5, -69.5) storing copper ore.

### Iron Ore Mining Facility at Position (-14.0, -53.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner Mining Drill at position (-14.0, -53.0) extracting iron ore.
- Wooden Chest at position (-14.5, -54.5) storing iron ore.
- Wooden Chest at position (-12.5, -54.5) storing iron ore and copper plates.
- Burner Inserter at position (-13.5, -54.5) transferring items but output is blocked.

### Iron Plate Storage Facility at Position (-16.5, -64.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Wooden Chest at position (-16.5, -64.5) storing iron plates.
- Burner Inserter at position (-15.5, -64.5) transferring iron plates.

### Iron Plate Storage Facility at Position (-17.5, -69.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Wooden Chest at position (-17.5, -69.5) storing iron plates.
- Burner Inserter at position (-16.5, -69.5) waiting for source items.

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when using inserters without nearby entities to accept items
- Ensure that there is a nearby entity that can accept items from the inserter before attempting to insert items.

### Errors when placing items into full chests
- Regularly check and empty chests that are full to prevent mining drills and inserters from halting operations.
